i really love plants.

participant_2.background:
I don't like to dress up because I am more comfortable in my own clothes.
i work in a coffee shop.
i am a lawyer.
I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success.
i like the taste of cheese.

content.text: Hi, I'm doing well, thanks! How are you?
I'm doing great! Thanks for asking!
What do you do for a living?
I'm an environmental engineer. I work at a company that helps companies reduce their environmental impact.
Oh, that sounds like an interesting job! What do you like about it?
I like the fact that I'm making a difference in the world. I also like the fact that I get to work outside and be around nature.
That's great! I used to be a teacher, but I wanted to spend more time with my family, so I changed careers.
Oh, I see. Well, I'm glad you're happy with your new career!
Thanks! I am. I'm a lawyer now, and I love it!
That's great! I'm glad you found something you're passionate about.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I love hiking, fishing, and camping. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I like to go to the beach and play volleyball. I also like to go shopping.
I love the beach! I'm not much of a shopper, though.
Well, that's okay. We can still be friends!
